articles.author: TOI World Desk
articles.title: How astronauts stuck in space end up with Santa hats for Christmas? Internet flooded with conspiracy theo - The Times of India
articles.description: US News: NASA astronauts Butch Wilmore and Sunita Williams wore Santa hats in space this Christmas, sparking internet theories. NASA reveals the festive decorations were part of a holiday resupply mission, bringing cheer to astronauts stranded aboard the ISS.
